title: SCP-7578/Veekat fanart
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

Here is my fanart of Veekat from [[[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-7578|SCP-7578]]] by [[*user daveyoufool]]. I've always loved this SCP and I've wanted to draw Veekat ever since I first read it, so here he is! Hope you like it!

[[=image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/art:scp-7578-veekat-fanart/veekat width="500px"]]
author: DianaBerry
